mapper.sql: id, phone, wx_open_id, wx_union_id, nick_name, user_avatar, user_desc, user_location, user_status, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.insert:
insert into baojiav2.biz_user(phone, wx_open_id, wx_union_id, nick_name, user_avatar, user_desc, user_location, user_status, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.phone}, #{entity.wxOpenId}, #{entity.wxUnionId}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.userAvatar}, #{entity.userDesc}, #{entity.userLocation}, #{entity.userStatus}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})

insert into baojiav2.biz_user(phone, wx_open_id, wx_union_id, nick_name, user_avatar, user_desc, user_location, user_status, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.phone}, #{entity.wxOpenId}, #{entity.wxUnionId}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.userAvatar}, #{entity.userDesc}, #{entity.userLocation}, #{entity.userStatus}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update phone = values(phone) , wx_open_id = values(wx_open_id) , wx_union_id = values(wx_union_id) , nick_name = values(nick_name) , user_avatar = values(user_avatar) , user_desc = values(user_desc) , user_location = values(user_location) , user_status = values(user_status) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , is_delete = values(is_delete)
